clintock:AminoAcidKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Structural units that make up proteins. Activates at the end of each turn.

clintock:BaseKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Fundamental units of the genetic code found in DNA.

clintock:ChromosomeKeyword.DESCRIPTION: DNA molecule. Can be mapped as part of #yThe #yGenome #yProject.

clintock:CytosineKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Red #yBase: Deals damage to a random enemy.

clintock:EssentialKeyword.DESCRIPTION: #yAmino-Acids that must be supplied in diet. See the #bClintock #bWiki for a complete list.

clintock:Intron.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable status card that prevents #yBases from #yLinking.

clintock:Knockout.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable status card that prevents #yBases from evoking.

clintock:LinkKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Puts a #yBase into your first empty slot. If no empty slots exist, #yBinds an #yAmino-Acid to make room.

clintock:NonessentialKeyword.DESCRIPTION: #yAmino-Acids that can be synthesized in the body. See the #bClintock #bWiki for a complete list.

clintock:PolypeptideKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Group of #yAmino-Acids that activate at the end of each turn.

clintock:SequencerKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Scientific device used in determining the order of #yBases in DNA.

clintock:Transposon.DESCRIPTION: Adds a copy of the card to your hand when played.

clintock:ThymineKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Yellow #yBase: Deals damage to ALL enemies.
